sections.heading: to 31-24-7 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1994, ch. 144, § 15 repealed 31-24-1 to 31-24-7 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1989, ch. 210, §§ 2, 3 and Laws 1987, ch. 19, §§ 1-7, relating to crime victims' and witnessess' bill of rights, effective January 1, 1995. For provisions of former sections,seethe 1993 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com. For present comparable provisions,see31-26-1 NMSA 1978 et seq.
